Founded in 2024 by four people from different professional backgrounds, united by one common desire, namely *going beyond established frameworks*. ::: ::: {.hero-section} ![](../images/index-2nd-image.jpeg) ::: {.hero-content} # *Going Beyond Established Frameworks* ::: ::: ::: {.index-text} Whether documentary or fiction films - short, medium or feature-length - TV or web series, podcasts, music or live art, our aim is to promote and create audiovisual works with cross-media approach ambitions, while supporting bold and innovative artists. ::: ::: {.hero-section} ![](../images/projects-line.jpeg) ::: {.hero-content} # CURRENT PROJECTS ::: ::: ::: {.project-grid} ::: {.project-card} ### ![](../images/meat_me_logo_paysage.jpeg) A short film project by Rani Gillioz ::: ::: {.project-card} ### ![](../images/si-les-morts-pouvaient-parler.jpg) An audio fiction project by Vincent Lettry ::: ::: {.project-card} ### ![](../images/crypto-facto_petit.jpg) Created by Vincent Lettry Podcast, 105 episodes, 2023 – today Written, Directed, Produced, Edited, Voice [Listen Now](https://cryptofacto.buzzsprout.com){.button} ::: ::: Hidden link used to verify my account on GitHub
